方法1 是否對稱
```{r}
library(knitr)
x=rnorm(50,mean=0,sd=1)
y=rnorm(1000,mean=0,sd=1)
xmean=mean(x)
upmean=x[x>xmean]
downmean=x[x<xmean]
upmean
downmean
test=min(length(upmean),length(downmean))
pbinom(q=test,size = 50,prob = 0.5)
```
方法2 是否對稱利用mean和median的差距以range標準化後進行比較
```{r}
xmedian=median(x)
range=abs(range(x)[1]-range(x)[2])
dd=abs(xmean-xmedian)/range
dd
#製作100個norm樣本
ss=0
for (i in 1:100){
  x=rnorm(50,mean=0,sd=1)
  ss[i]=abs(mean(x)-median(x))/abs(range(x)[1]-range(x)[2])
}
ss
sort(ss)[91:100]
dd
```
